name: Silly Bliss
description:
CONTROLS AND INSTRUCTIONS

Objective: Don´t momo be eaten by the killer whale.
Controls: Left mouse clicks to create ice blocks.

STORY

Childhood is a blissful silly ride, but sometimes can be a dangerous one. Icy loves sliding in the ice, but it seems that he will need your help this winter. 

TEAM

Yata Andersen: Art, Game Concept

Ernani Rocha: Game Design And Code 

PsySurf: Music

Special thanks: Lucas Carvalho
